item.title: Delay and Cancels - Flights to/from Brazil
item.description: By Thais Baracat. August 4, 2022. Introduction Which companies are the ones who cancels most flights or have most delays in Brazilian flights? Which are the airports with most delays? In order to find out, I have analysed data from the public data provided by ANAC - Agência Nacional de Aviação Civil, as detailed below. Data The data used in this activity is from the 2021 year.

item.title: The evolution of Harry Potter books
item.description: By Thais Baracat. April 13, 2022. Millenials grew up with a pretty much specific atmosphere. Mostly certain, the kids from the 00s are proud to have read J. K. Rolling’s Harry Potter. But the question is: did the series grew up with these kids too? Let’s find out if the series became more mature over the course of the books. Data Data used was available through the “harrypotter” library.

item.title: Are Batman movies darker than they used to be?
item.description: By Thais Baracat. April 8, 2022. We can all agree that Batman is the darkest superhero of them all. But after watching the brand-new batman movie, starring Robert Pattinson and Zöe Kravitz, I caught myself thinking if the franchise movies were getting emotionally darker - or was it just the noir aesthetics? In order to find out, I have selected a collection of batman movies and proceeded with a sentiment analysis of the dialogues held in each film.

item.title: Are Batman movies darker than they used to be?
item.description: By Thais Baracat. April 8, 2022. We can all agree that Batman is the darkest superhero of them all. But after watching the brand-new batman movie, starring Robert Pattinson and Zöe Kravitz, I caught myself thinking if the franchise movies were getting emotionally darker - or was it just the noir aesthetics? In order to find out, I have selected a collection of batman movies and proceeded with a sentiment analysis of the dialogues held in each film.
